heading: the news today, oh boy
subheading: former beatle george harrison is in stable condition after being stabbed in the chest by an intruder who broke into his oxfordshire mansion early thursday, police said. harrison and his wife, olivia, were able to subdue the attacker and hold him until police arrived to make an arrest. a 33-year-old liverpool man was taken into custody. harrison, 56, known as the "quiet beatle," has been just that, living quietly on his estate west of london for the past 20 years. in 1998, he disclosed that he had been battling throat cancer for more than a year.
author: wired staff
text: former beatle george harrison is in stable condition after being stabbed in the chest by an intruder who broke into his oxfordshire mansion early thursday, police said. harrison and his wife, olivia, were able to subdue the attacker and hold him until police arrived to make an arrest. a 33-year-old liverpool man was taken into custody. harrison, 56, known as the "quiet beatle," has been just that, living quietly on his estate west of london for the past 20 years. in 1998, he disclosed that he had been battling throat cancer for more than a year.
